title: What Rank can Iron queue with?
body: What Rank can Iron queue with?

replies.body: Iron and Bronze. Possibly brand new Unranked too (if not for the first game in placements, then certainly once someone has gained a provisional rank).
Cool as Iron people seem rare :) guess u can only see them on bronze
Not sure why they didn't go with tin or copper, those are the pre requisites to bronze, runescape 101. Iron is a level up from bronze.
